description: Retrieves details of a specific workload estimate.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the workload estimate to retrieve.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the retrieved workload estimate.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the retrieved workload estimate.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the workload estimate was created.

nested_items.name: expiresAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the workload estimate will expire.

nested_items.name: rateType
nested_items.description: The type of pricing rates used for the estimate.

nested_items.name: rateTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the pricing rates used for the estimate.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the workload estimate.

nested_items.name: totalCost
nested_items.description: The total estimated cost for the workload.

nested_items.name: costCurrency
nested_items.description: The currency of the estimated cost.

nested_items.name: failureMessage
nested_items.description: An error message if the workload estimate retrieval failed.
